fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Watchful: Learn 4 non-revealed names. At least 1 of them is a non-Order (Susceptible). [Activates D2]
- Nosy: Learn if the room you went to last Night had at least 1 non-Order member (Uncertain). [Activates D4]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Observe: Learn a random attacking card played by Chaos this phase at the end of the phase (Uncertain). [3 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only, Unlocks D2] 
- Tapwire: Choose a player. Find out if they played an attacking card this phase at the end of the phase. [2 uses]
- Scavenge: Gain a non-special item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
